pages.text: $(bgreen)PeaShooter$() has a healthy, well-balanced breakfast of sunlight and high-fiber carbon dioxide, which make everything all possible.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one pea$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several peas each tick$() which last 5 seconds.
